title: Trimming, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut supplementary warp pile in a satin foundation (velvet)
description: Red, yellow, green and white trimming fragment in a design of green and yellow leaves placed diagonally and bordered with red and yellow bands.
